product_name: Mizuno Wave EVO Ferus Trail-Running Shoes - Men's
long_description: Run fierce in the Mizuno Wave EVO Ferus Trail-Running shoes. These minimalist running shoes feature a zero drop and Wave technology in the forefeet for maximum protection, comfort and a smooth ride. 0mm heel-to-toe drop encourages a natural midfoot or forefoot strike. Mizuno Wave(R) midsole technology disperses impact uniformly over length/width of midsole, providing unrivaled cushioning and pronation control. Breathable nylon mesh uppers feature thermoplastic urethane overlays for lightweight support; nylon linings wick moisture away from the feet. Copolymer midsole material is responsive and lightweight, and offers increased rebound for great momentum at toe-off. Midsoles help minimize rapid acceleration and deceleration of your feet during transition, resulting in a wonderfully smooth ride. Aggressive rubber outsoles feature an X pattern that provides extra grip and traction across rugged terrain.
short_description: Run fierce in the Mizuno Wave EVO Ferus Trail-Running shoes. These minimalist running shoes feature a zero drop and Wave technology in the forefeet for maximum protection, comfort and a smooth ride.
